detectors.description: Withdrawable.withdrawToken(IERC20,uint256,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Referral.sol#194-202) ignores return value by token.transfer(sendTo,amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Referral.sol#200)

Withdrawable.setBlackList(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Referral.sol#213-215) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- blacklist[token] = true (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Referral.sol#214)

detectors.description:
PermissionGroups.removeOperator(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Referral.sol#158-170) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- operatorsGroup[i] = operatorsGroup[operatorsGroup.length - 1] (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Referral.sol#164)
	- operatorsGroup.pop() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Referral.sol#165)

detectors.description:
Withdrawable.withdrawEther(uint256,address).sendTo (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Referral.sol#207) lacks a zero-check on :
		- (success) = sendTo.call.value(amount)() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Referral.sol#208)

Reentrancy in Withdrawable.withdrawEther(uint256,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Referral.sol#207-211):
	External calls:
	- (success) = sendTo.call.value(amount)() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Referral.sol#208)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- EtherWithdraw(amount,sendTo) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Referral.sol#210)
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [Withdrawable.withdrawEther(uint256,address)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Referral.sol#L207-L211):
	External calls:
	- [(success) = sendTo.call.value(amount)()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Referral.sol#L208)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- [EtherWithdraw(amount,sendTo)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Referral.sol#L210)

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in Withdrawable.withdrawToken(IERC20,uint256,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Referral.sol#194-202):
	External calls:
	- token.transfer(sendTo,amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Referral.sol#200)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- TokenWithdraw(token,amount,sendTo) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Referral.sol#201)
